name: Man Of Chaos
description:
You are Man Of Chaos, hero of Wonder City. You posses many amazing powers. Unfortunately you can't exactly control them. What power you use next is always random. At least you can choose when to use them.

You can move with WASD, arrow keys or game pad joystick. Offensive powers are used with E, X or game pad B. Defensive powers are used with Q, Z or game pad

This is my submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020
